content: I'm trying to change the Work Group on a number of issues from Pharmacy to CDS. I made the change on 2 issues, but now the status is "deferred". What do I do now?
In one case I opened the issue and made the change and in the other case I clicked on the 3 elipses on the right hand side and made the change
There was indeed a bug with the "Switch workgroup" option. Now fixed and I've re-opened the 3 affected issues.
